A1 the number 19: Simson, aged nineteen, was convicted on two charges of burglary. It's nineteen miles to the nearest town.
More examplesFewer examplesHer novels have been translated into nineteen languages.He was nineteen, in the full bloom of youth.The Giants winning streak remained unbroken for an impressive nineteen games.His shift lasted for nineteen hours.It's nineteen miles to the nearest town.
